original_text: If so, you must take both of them to the gate of that town. You must throw stones at both of them there, until they die. The young woman is guilty because she did not shout aloud for help. They were in the town, so someone would have heard her. The man is guilty because he had sex with the future wife of another man. In this way, you will remove evil acts from among you.
korean_text: 너희는 그들을 둘 다 성읍 문으로 끌어내고 그들을 돌로 쳐죽일 것이니 그 처녀는 성안에 있으면서도 소리 지르지 아니하였음이요 그 남자는 그 이웃의 아내를 욕보였음이라 너는 이같이 하여 너희 가운데에서 악을 제할지니라

sentences.original_text: you must take both of them
to the gate of that town
You must throw stones at both of them there
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그들 둘에게 돌을 던져야 한다

sentences.original_text: because she did not shout aloud for help
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그녀는 도움을 외치지 않았기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: so someone would have heard her
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 누군가 그녀의 소리를 들었을 것이다

sentences.original_text: because he had sex with the future wife of another man
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그는 다른 남자의 미래 아내와 성관계를 했기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: you will remove evil acts from among you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중에서 악한 행위들을 제거할 것이다
